description: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

items.content:

items.title: Hard Memories

items.content:

items.title: Giving It Another Go

items.content:
How being a furry can help you avoid lying, an update from the woman with a suicidally coercive husband, a wife contemplates using a chastity belt to get her husband to help around the house, and the thrilling mystery of a disgusting yoghurt container at Hampshire College, plus more!


PLAYLIST!

https://audiobulb.bandcamp.com/track/2-degrees-of-internalisation

https://ab-tomo-nakaguchi.bandcamp.com/track/the-starry-night

https://audiobulb.bandcamp.com/track/sand-crawl

https://eileanrec.bandcamp.com/track/yellow

https://eileanrec.bandcamp.com/track/violet-green-pillowdiver-remix


SECRETS!

1-929 SECRETS or

https://secretshotline.org


DONATE (Longer episodes!)

https://loveandradio.org/member

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.

items.title: Go Down Or I'll Cut You Off

items.content:

Listeners grapple with eating disorders.


If you or someone you know is dealing with an eating disorder, please visit https://nationaleatingdisorders.org/ or call 1-800-931-2237.

items.title: Good Luck to Us

items.content:
There are many ways to say, 'I love you'

Just by being there when things are sad and scary

Just by being there, being there

Being there to say, 'I love you'


MUSIC!

https://eileanrec.bandcamp.com/album/nine

items.title: Keep On Walking

itunes.author: Love and Radio
itunes.summary: What’s your secret? Listen as anonymous callers from across the globe share what is hidden in their lives. It’s both a voyeuristic and affirming experience. Leave your own at 1-929-SECRETS (929-732-7387) or secretshotline.org.

title: The Secrets Hotline
